parameters.name: Fwd
parameters.description: True gets the reverse offset setting in the forward direction, false gets it in the reverse direction

title: ISurfExtrudeFeatureData.GetReverseOffset
description: Gets the reverse offset direction setting for the end condition of this extruded surface.

parameters.name: Fwd
parameters.description: True gets the reverse offset setting in the forward direction, false gets it in the reverse direction

returns: True if the reverse offset setting is enabled, false if it is disabled
